text: Richard Mallié (born October 26, 1948 in Besançon) was a member of the National Assembly of France. He represented Bouches-du-Rhône's 10th constituency from 2002 to 2012, as a member of the Union for a Popular Movement. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:People from Besançon Category:Republican Party (France) politicians Category:Liberal Democracy (France) politicians Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:The Popular Right Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Richard Mallié
